collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly, including your name, email address, and transaction data. We also automatically collect usage data to improve our services.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to provide and improve Ofra services, communicate with you about your account, and send important updates about your transactions.

storage.title: Data Storage & Security
storage.content: Your data is stored securely on servers located in Canada. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your information.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also request a copy of your data or restrict certain processing activities.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, contact us at privacy@ofra.ca or write to: Ofra, Moncton, New Brunswick, Canada.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Ofra, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: Ofra provides real estate transaction management tools for professionals. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time.

account.title: Your Account
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Paid plans are billed monthly or annually. Prices are in Canadian dollars and subject to applicable taxes. Refunds are provided according to our refund policy.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: You may cancel your account at any time. We may terminate or suspend your account for violations of these terms or for any other reason at our discretion.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Ofra is provided 'as is' without warranties. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.
